item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: Tomorrow we'll be hanging out with Rob Allison and I plan to ask him all about the online editor and how he came up with the 14px concept. If you have questions for Rob, leave them in the comments and I'll be sure to ask him.
item.content:encoded: Tomorrow we’ll be hanging out with Rob Allison and I plan to ask him all about the online editor and how he came up with the 14px concept. If you have questions for Rob, leave them in the comments and I’ll be sure to ask him.
